


```{r}
students <- read_csv("https://pos.it/r4ds-students-csv", na = c("N/A", ""))

# change names and remove spaces
renamed_students <- students |> 
    rename(
        student_id = `Student ID`,
        full_name = `Full Name`
    )

# or
janitor_students <- janitor::clean_names(students) |> 
    mutate(meal_plan = factor(meal_plan),
           age = parse_number(if_else(age == "five", "5", age)))

# will skip 2 first lines
read_csv(
  "The first line of metadata
  The second line of metadata
  x,y,z
  1,2,3",
  skip = 2
)

# will drop the lines beginning with the # or the comments
read_csv(
  "# A comment I want to skip
  x,y,z
  1,2,3",
  comment = "#",
  col_names = TRUE
  # col_names = c("a", "b")
)

read_csv(
  "1,2,3
  4,5,6",
  col_names = FALSE
)

read_csv(
  "1,2,3
  4,5,6",
  col_names = TRUE
)
```

```{r}
write_csv(mtcars, "~/github/RfDS/mtcars.csv")
write_csv(mtcars, "~/github/RfDS/mtcars_two.csv")

folder <- "~/github/RfDS/"

csv_fls <- list.files(folder, 
                      pattern = "*.csv")

for (i in 1:length(csv_fls)) {
    assign(csv_fls[i],
           read_csv(paste(folder, csv_fls[i], sep ='/')))
}
```
